description: Bug fix for MFP screenshot parsing, movement navigation UI, Tawkify removal, and email v2a refresh

userStories.title: Fix parse API prompt to allow macros without calories
userStories.description: As a user, I want to upload MFP screenshots that show macros but not calories, so that I can still log my nutrition.
acceptanceCriteria: Update prompt in src/app/api/nutrition/parse/route.ts to clarify: macros without calories is valid
Prompt should instruct AI to only set error if the image is NOT a nutrition screenshot or completely unreadable
Finding protein/carbs/fats without calories should return confidence: high/medium with error: null
npm run typecheck passes

userStories.title: Fix client error handling for partial nutrition data
userStories.description: As a user, I want the nutrition modal to accept macros-only data without showing an error.
acceptanceCriteria: Update src/components/NutritionLogModal.tsx error handling at line 166-168
Only show error if data.error is truthy AND no macros were extracted (protein, carbs, fats all null)
If macros exist but calories null, proceed normally (calories computed from macros already works)
npm run typecheck passes

userStories.title: Remove Tawkify chat widget
userStories.description: As a developer, I want to remove the Tawkify chat widget from the app.
acceptanceCriteria: Delete src/components/TawkChat.tsx file
Remove TawkChat import and usage from src/app/components/layouts/MainLayout.tsx
npm run typecheck passes
npm run build succeeds without errors

userStories.title: Add prev/next navigation to exercise section
userStories.description: As a user, I want prev/next arrows at the top of the exercise section so I can navigate between exercises easily.
acceptanceCriteria: Add navigation header to exercise section in src/app/components/WorkoutPlanDisplay.tsx
Display format: ← Exercise 2 of 5 → with arrow buttons
Style with v2a design: navy background, coral accent on arrows, Outfit font
Left arrow disabled on first exercise, right arrow disabled on last exercise
Clicking arrows navigates to prev/next exercise
npm run typecheck passes
Verify component renders correctly in browser

userStories.title: Update email base layout with v2a design
userStories.description: As a brand, I want all emails to use the v2a design system for consistency.
acceptanceCriteria: Update src/lib/email/templates/layout.ts with v2a design tokens
Colors: White background, Navy (#0F172A) header/footer, Coral (#FF6B6B) accents
Font: Outfit (sans-serif) for body, Space Mono for any monospace
Header: Bold gradient with coral accent, energetic tone
Footer: Navy gradient with coral social icons
Buttons: Coral background (#FF6B6B), white text, rounded corners
npm run typecheck passes
userStories.notes: Issue #219 - Phase 1: Base layout cascades to all templates

userStories.title: Update magic-link email template to v2a

acceptanceCriteria: Update src/lib/email/templates/magic-link.ts to use v2a styling

CTA button in coral with clear action text
Maintain 24hr expiry warning
npm run typecheck passes
